title: A true and brief relation of the bloudy battell fought foure dayes and foure nights together betweene Duke Bernard van VVimeren, victour, and Iohn de Weerdt, with the Duke Savelli, both imperiall generalls, vvho were utterly overthrowne and beaten / translated out of authentick letters, as well out of the Duke of Wimeren his owne letter, as another written to a great lord from Basill.
author: Bernhard, Duke of Saxe-Weimar, 1604-1639.
publisher: Printed by E.G. for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley, neere Lumbard-street,
notes: Bound with: The warnings of Germany (STC 3759), The invasions of Germanie (STC 11791), The lamentations of Germany (STC 24761) and Lacrymæ Germaniæ.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library and the British Library.
